column5: After playing little bit with my woodworking tools I've decided to make some "new" baits. Bathtub and swimming pool test were very satisfactory.. These just need final clear coat.  Few more in different stages of "developement"
Awesome looking lures!  Look forward to hearing how they work!
Awsome handywork there Keram!  Hope they catch you a biggun
Excellent work Keram!!!  The bottom 2 look like they could double as duck and goose calls too!  I'm positive you'll catch a nice fish on all of them!!!
I'm not a hunter Glen, so I have no idea what you are talking about  . They are just oversized poppers.
... and darn good looking ones too!!!
Awsome looking lures.  Good job and good luck with them.  I have a feeling that they are going to be successful for you.

very neat, how do you get the scale pattern from the paint. Im thinking wrapping like egg sac netting around the body of the bait , spraying it lightly and removing the netting? Or window screen. Definitely interesting however you did it. The whole project, not just the paint schemes
Cool looking lures, best of luck.
Any netting will do. The only thing you have to keep in mind is that the netting has to be tight to the body of the lure
very nice  even the paint is nice  are u puttin skirts on the poppers?
Yes, I'm working on it.   No skirt - no popper
Awesome job. Good luck on the water.  Let us know how you make out.
great job!  I especially like the poppers!
Very impressive....nice work  Cheers  Craig
Very impressive work keram.....great job  The first one I like and if you don't mine me asking,  what do you call it?? and what kind of wood do you use to build them??  Again great job  Leechman
Very nice!! Good luck with those, look forward to hearing how they faired!
It has no name yet  . All kinds of wood (depends on the action I want or rather try to achieve), cedar, maple, baswood, pine, walnut and so on

No name, thats ok.  I'm sure you'll come up with one later on.....thanks for the info.  My father in law is a craftmen and uses basswood for the art work he does.  Again great work and when you make more.....Please post them, I'd like to see them! Leechman
nice work
